mcq.statement: Change the narration: the officer said to the peon, “If you do not do your duty well, I will dismiss you”.

options.a: The officer threatened to dismiss the peon if he did not do his duty well
options.b: The officer told the peon that if he did not do his duty well he would dismiss him
options.c: The officer suggested to the peon that if he did not do his duty well, he would be dismissed
